topic.title: Configure the Installation Medium
topic.shortdesc: Configure the installation medium that will be used to provision the hosts.

ol.li:
Use the hammer medium create command to add the entry. The command requires the --name, --os-family and --path options.
The name option should specify a name that is appropriate for the installation.
The os-family should remain Redhat in most cases.
The path option specifies the path or URL to the installation tree.
